net.nemerosa.ontrack.model.security

Interface RoleContributor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NOPRoleContributor

    public interface RoleContributor
    Components which contributes some functions to a role.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends GlobalFunction>>> getGlobalFunctionContributionsForGlobalRoles()
      Gets the list of functions to contribute per global role.
      default java.util.List<net.nemerosa.ontrack.model.security.RoleDefinition> getGlobalRoles()
      Gets a list of global roles to add.
      default java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends ProjectFunction>>> getProjectFunctionContributionsForGlobalRoles()
      Gets the list of project functions to contribute per global role.
      default java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends ProjectFunction>>> getProjectFunctionContributionsForProjectRoles()
      Gets the list of functions to contribute per project role.
      default java.util.List<net.nemerosa.ontrack.model.security.RoleDefinition> getProjectRoles()
      Gets a list of project roles to add.

    • Method Detail

      • getGlobalRoles

        default java.util.List<net.nemerosa.ontrack.model.security.RoleDefinition> getGlobalRoles()
        Gets a list of global roles to add. The parent role (if defined) functions are inherited by the new role. If the parent role is null, the role will not have any inherited function.

      • getProjectRoles

        default java.util.List<net.nemerosa.ontrack.model.security.RoleDefinition> getProjectRoles()
        Gets a list of project roles to add. The parent role (if defined) functions are inherited by the new role. If the parent role is null, the role will not have any inherited function.

      • getGlobalFunctionContributionsForGlobalRoles

        default java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends GlobalFunction>>> getGlobalFunctionContributionsForGlobalRoles()
        Gets the list of functions to contribute per global role.
        Returns:
        List of GlobalFunction per role - none of them must be annotated with the CoreFunction annotation.

      • getProjectFunctionContributionsForGlobalRoles

        default java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends ProjectFunction>>> getProjectFunctionContributionsForGlobalRoles()
        Gets the list of project functions to contribute per global role.
        Returns:
        List of ProjectFunction per role - none of them must be annotated with the CoreFunction annotation.

      • getProjectFunctionContributionsForProjectRoles

        default java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends ProjectFunction>>> getProjectFunctionContributionsForProjectRoles()
        Gets the list of functions to contribute per project role.
        Returns:
        List of ProjectFunction per role - none of them must be annotated with the CoreFunction annotation.
